content:
DirectoryServer Class

In this Article

The DirectoryServer class is an abstract class that represents an Active Directory Domain Services server or AD LDS instance.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class DirectoryServer : IDisposable

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • DirectoryServer

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)

Constructors summary

DirectoryServer()

Initializes a new instance of the DirectoryServer class.

Properties summary

InboundConnections

Retrieves the inbound replication connections for this directory server.
IPAddress

Retrieves the IP address of this directory server.
Name

Gets the name of the directory server.
OutboundConnections

Gets the outbound replication connections for this directory server.
Partitions

Gets the partitions on this directory server.
SiteName

Gets the name of the site that this directory server belongs to.
SyncFromAllServersCallback

Gets or sets the synchronization delegate for this directory server.

Methods summary

CheckReplicationConsistency()

Uses the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) to verify and recalculate the replication topology for this server.
Dispose()

Releases all managed and unmanaged resources that are used by the object.
Dispose(Boolean)

Releases all unmanaged resources and, optionally, all managed resources that are used by the object.
Finalize()

Overrides the stem.Object.Finalize* method.
GetAllReplicationNeighbors()

Retrieves all of the replication neighbors for this object.
GetDirectoryEntry()

Retrieves a DirectoryEntry object that represents the directory server.
GetReplicationConnectionFailures()

Retrieves a collection of the replication connection failures for this directory server.
GetReplicationCursors(String)

Retrieves the replication cursor information for the specified partition.
GetReplicationMetadata(String)

Retrieves the replication metadata for a specific Active Directory Domain Services object.
GetReplicationNeighbors(String)

Retrieves the replication neighbors of this directory server for the specified partition.
GetReplicationOperationInformation()

Retrieves the current and pending replication operations for this directory server.
MoveToAnotherSite(String)

Moves the directory server to another site within the forest or configuration set.
SyncReplicaFromAllServers(String,SyncFromAllServersOptions)

Causes this directory server to synchronize the specified partition with all other directory servers in the same site that hosts the partition.
SyncReplicaFromServer(String,String)

Causes this directory server to synchronize the specified partition with the specified directory server.
ToString()

Retrieves the name of the directory server.
TriggerSyncReplicaFromNeighbors(String)

Begins a synchronization of the specified partition.

Constructors

  • DirectoryServer()

    Initializes a new instance of the DirectoryServer class.

    protected DirectoryServer ();

Properties

  • InboundConnections

    Retrieves the inbound replication connections for this directory server.

    public abstract System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnectionCollection InboundConnections { get; }

    Property Value

    • ReplicationConnectionCollection

      A ReplicationConnectionCollection object that contains the inbound replication connections for this directory server.

  • IPAddress

    Retrieves the IP address of this directory server.

    public abstract string IPAddress { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The Internet protocol (IP) address of this directory server in string form.

  • Name

    Gets the name of the directory server.

    public string Name { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the directory server.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The object has been disposed.

  • OutboundConnections

    Gets the outbound replication connections for this directory server.

    public abstract System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnectionCollection OutboundConnections { get; }

    Property Value

    • ReplicationConnectionCollection

      A ReplicationConnectionCollection object that contains the outbound replication connections for this directory server.

  • Partitions

    Gets the partitions on this directory server.

    public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyStringCollection Partitions { get; }

    Property Value

    • ReadOnlyStringCollection

      A ReadOnlyStringCollection object that contains the distinguished names of the partitions on this directory server.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The object has been disposed.

  • SiteName

    Gets the name of the site that this directory server belongs to.

    public abstract string SiteName { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the site that this directory server belongs to.

  • SyncFromAllServersCallback

    Gets or sets the synchronization delegate for this directory server.

    public abstract System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncUpdateCallback SyncFromAllServersCallback { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • SyncUpdateCallback

      The delegate that this directory server will use for synchronization notifications.

Methods

  • CheckReplicationConsistency()

    Uses the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) to verify and recalculate the replication topology for this server.

    public abstract void CheckReplicationConsistency ();
  • Dispose()

    Releases all managed and unmanaged resources that are used by the object.

    public void Dispose ();
  • Dispose(Boolean)

    Releases all unmanaged resources and, optionally, all managed resources that are used by the object.

    protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);

    Parameters

    • disposing
      Boolean

      Determines if the managed resources should be released. true if the managed resources are released; false if the managed resources are not released.

    Remarks

    The disposing parameter affects only the release of the managed resources. The unmanaged resources are always released by this method.

  • Finalize()

    Overrides the stem.Object.Finalize* method.

    ~DirectoryServer ();
  • GetAllReplicationNeighbors()

    Retrieves all of the replication neighbors for this object.

    public abstract System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighborCollection GetAllReplicationNeighbors ();

    Returns

    • ReplicationNeighborCollection

      An ReplicationNeighborCollection object that contains the replication neighbors for this object.

  • GetDirectoryEntry()

    Retrieves a DirectoryEntry object that represents the directory server.

    public System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry GetDirectoryEntry ();

    Returns

    • DirectoryEntry

      A DirectoryEntry object that represents the directory server.

    Exceptions

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The object has been disposed.

  • GetReplicationConnectionFailures()

    Retrieves a collection of the replication connection failures for this directory server.

    public abstract System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationFailureCollection GetReplicationConnectionFailures ();

    Returns

    • ReplicationFailureCollection

      A ReplicationFailureCollection object that contains the replication connection failures for this directory server.

  • GetReplicationCursors(String)

    Retrieves the replication cursor information for the specified partition.

    public abstract System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationCursorCollection GetReplicationCursors (string partition);

    Parameters

    • partition
      String

      The distinguished name of the partition for which to retrieve the replication cursor information.

    Returns

    • ReplicationCursorCollection

      A ReplicationCursorCollection that contains the replication cursor information.

  • GetReplicationMetadata(String)

    Retrieves the replication metadata for a specific Active Directory Domain Services object.

    public abstract System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryReplicationMetadata GetReplicationMetadata (string objectPath);

    Parameters

    • objectPath
      String

      The path to the object for which to retrieve the replication metadata.

    Returns

    • ActiveDirectoryReplicationMetadata

      An ActiveDirectoryReplicationMetadata object that contains the replication metadata for the specified object.

  • GetReplicationNeighbors(String)

    Retrieves the replication neighbors of this directory server for the specified partition.

    public abstract System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighborCollection GetReplicationNeighbors (string partition);

    Parameters

    • partition
      String

      The distinguished name of the partition for which to retrieve the replication.

    Returns

    • ReplicationNeighborCollection

      A ReplicationNeighborCollection object that contains the replication neighbors for this object.

  • GetReplicationOperationInformation()

    Retrieves the current and pending replication operations for this directory server.

    public abstract System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationOperationInformation GetReplicationOperationInformation ();

    Returns

    • ReplicationOperationInformation

      A ReplicationOperationInformation object that contains the current and pending replication operations.

  • MoveToAnotherSite(String)

    Moves the directory server to another site within the forest or configuration set.

    public void MoveToAnotherSite (string siteName);

    Parameters

    • siteName
      String

      The name of the site within the domain to which to move the directory server.

    Exceptions

    • ActiveDirectoryOperationException

      A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

    • ArgumentNullException

      siteName is null.

    • ArgumentException

      siteName is an empty string.

    • ObjectDisposedException

      The object has been disposed.

    Remarks

    If the directory server is a domain controller, this method will move the domain controller to a different site in the forest. If the directory server is an AD LDS instance, this method will move the AD LDS instance to a different site in the configuration set.

  • SyncReplicaFromAllServers(String,SyncFromAllServersOptions)

    Causes this directory server to synchronize the specified partition with all other directory servers in the same site that hosts the partition.

    public abstract void SyncReplicaFromAllServers (string partition, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOptions options);

    Parameters

    • partition
      String

      The distinguished name of the partition to synchronize.

    • options
      SyncFromAllServersOptions

      A combination of one or more of the SyncFromAllServersOptions members.

  • SyncReplicaFromServer(String,String)

    Causes this directory server to synchronize the specified partition with the specified directory server.

    public abstract void SyncReplicaFromServer (string partition, string sourceServer);

    Parameters

    • partition
      String

      The distinguished name of the partition to synchronize.

    • sourceServer
      String

      The name of the server to synchronize the partition with.

  • ToString()

    Retrieves the name of the directory server.

    public override string ToString ();

    Returns

    • String

      The name of the server.

  • TriggerSyncReplicaFromNeighbors(String)

    Begins a synchronization of the specified partition.

    public abstract void TriggerSyncReplicaFromNeighbors (string partition);

    Parameters

    • partition
      String

      The distinguished name of the partition to synchronize.
